      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int UserInteraction.betPoints​(Player player)
      BetPoints function, asks the player to bet and saves the amount in an int variable.
      java.lang.String UserInteraction.getAnAnswer​(Player player)
      This method accepts a Player object, asks the player for an answer and returns the input.
      java.lang.String UserInteraction.getNewAnswer​(Player player)
      getNewAnswer is called when the player types an answer that does not exist and asks for a new input.
      int UserInteraction.newBetPoints​(Player player)
      newBetPoints is a function that is called when the player types a non acceptable amount to bet.

      void UserInteraction.showRoundScores​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      The function showRoundScores is called at the end of each round, to show the current score of the players.
      void UserInteraction.whoWon​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      whoWon is a void function that is called after each question and it announces who answered correctly and who didn't by checking their status.
